de.must.markup
Class GroupOfStorables

java.lang.Object
  de.must.markup.GroupOfMarkupables
      de.must.markup.GroupOfStorables

public class GroupOfStorables
extends GroupOfMarkupables

A group of storables belonging to the same entity. Provides load and save functions. To be used by "use bean" classes in Java Server Pages development to reduce loop coding.

See Also:
Storable

Parameters:
mainDataObject - the data object that is to be used mainly
sessionData - the session's public data
maxItems - the maximum number of storable components used for array capacity aspects

Parameters:

visibleColumn - the column to be used to fill the combo box from the source data object
orderByColumnName - the column name to determine for the list order
nameForNoChoice - the expression that indicates "no choice"

the created database connected combo box
